content.raw:
Is `AdvertiseOptions` not available outside of the publisher? Is that why we're assuming that we won't record it?

It seems that the only field in `AdvertiseOptions` right now is the scope, which probably won't impact playback in any significant way (I think we can make the default playback scope be `ALL`, and it wouldn't affect anything negatively).

That said, if we ever extend `AdvertiseOptions` to contain fields that could affect the fidelity of a playback, we might want to consider ways to broadcast those settings, perhaps over a meta-topic.
